text:
Created attachment 34240
jmeter log file

Jmeter 3.0 throwing a Warning when calling particular css files, but no issues with  Jmeter 2.X.

Due to this issue, size of  jmeter 3.0 log file increasing exponentially during the test run. This causing I/O operations slow and leading to socket timeout , Too many files open error.

This WARN message will not appear if we disable "Non Html resources"

Error message : com.helger.css.handler.CSSNodeToDomainObject: Media expression uses unknown feature 'min--moz-device-pixel-ratio'

This is especially happening with jquery.fancybox.css file content


/*Retina graphics!*/
@media only screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5),
	   only screen and (min--moz-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5),
	   only screen and (min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5){

	#fancybox-loading, .fancybox-close, .fancybox-prev span, .fancybox-next span {
		background-image: url('fancybox_sprite@2x.png');
		background-size: 44px 152px; /*The size of the normal image, half the size of the hi-res image*/


One of the user experience such issue but not sure how it will be fixed
https://github.com/phax/ph-css/issues/22

I am using default jmeter 3.0 setup with  ph-css-4.1.1.jar , ph-commons-6.2.4.jar
creator: maarthala@gmail.com
felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
